detail_desc: Set with a shirt, sweater vest and bow tie or tie. Shirt in a cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a fake chest pocket and fake flap front pockets. Buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
